Uses of Package
mapr.tasks

  • Packages that use mapr.tasks 
    Package Description
    mapr.examples  
    mapr.tasks  
    mapr.worker  
  • Classes in mapr.tasks used by mapr.examples 
    Class and Description
    Mapper
    Abstract class for Mapper that users can extend based on the MapReduce job.
    Reducer
    Abstract class for Reducer that users can extend based on the MapReduce job.
    Sorter
    Abstract class for Sorter that users can extend based on the MapReduce job.
    Task
    Dummy runnable interface for all tasks in the MapReduce framework.

    Dummy runnable interface for all tasks in the MapReduce framework.

    Dummy runnable interface for all tasks in the MapReduce framework.
